title: Bebe Rexha Wants Us To Look At Her Backside In New Instagram Post
text:
Bebe Rexha is proud of her body and she wants you to be proud of it as well.

The "I'm A Mess" singer shared a sultry shot of her backside with all of her millions of followers.

"Wanted to give you a little real nAss on your timeline today. Love you," Rexha wrote in the caption of her post.

She made sure to include #BootyByGod and #everybodyisbeautiful.

Related:

Bebe Rexha Looks Back On ‘Uglyyy’ Baby Photo

Bebe Rexha Leaves Nothing to the Imagination In Honor of 30th Birthday

Bebe Rexha Slams Music Exec For Calling Her 'Too Old,' Says She's 'Fed Up'

Bebe Rexha Shakes Her Booty During Summer Pool Party

Bebe Rexha Leaves Fans Drooling During Creamy Italian Cooking Lesson

Fans Love It

Everyone sounded off with praise in the comments.

"Damn, Gina! So much YES!" Singer Bonnie McKee wrote.

Several fans left their appreciation and simply wrote "thanks" and her post was flooded with fire emojis.

She Loves Her Body

Bebe has been pushing body positivity and has not been shy about showing it off on social media.

In September, the star shared a video where she was backing it up on a private jet.

She was dancing to the 90’s classic “Back That AZZ Up,” and it looks like the pilots were the ones who were most impressed.

“In case of emergency please back that ass up,” Bebe’s caption read.

Her racy posts do not stop there.

On her 30th birthday, she shared a bathroom picture wearing nothing but a thong.

This post accrued almost two million likes.

"I’m fed up with being put in a box," she explained, adding, "I make my own rules. I’m tired of women getting labeled as 'hags' when they get old and gets get labeled as sexy with age."

She seems to be aging like a fine wine and she will have the "Last Hurrah" (Sorry for the bad pun).

Bebe Hot Shots
